title: PBE Accept
body:
I don't know if this would go under Help & Support, but here goes.

SO, I'm finally accepted to try out PBE right? 

I had logged in and my brother was going to watch me, but he pressed X on the PBE download thingy where it tells you, "You have been accepted
Download _____ now!"

So, to see if it worked again I re-logged in to see if it would pop up but alas, it did not.

Do I have to re-enter ?

replies.body:
I took a look at the account you are posting on, but don't see that it's been accepted.  You can check the status of your application through the[ PBE Page](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup), and it should appear as Step 2 (pending)  for the account you are posting from.  Make sure you're signed into the correct account!

You can change your login on the top right of that page.  PBE acceptance is not necessary for downloading the game, but it is to create an account there.  More information on PBE sign up can also be found on our [FAQ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq).   Hopefully that helps clear some things up, but let me know if you have any questions!
